page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN STANMORE
page.content:
A brief survey produced the following levels of employment in Stanmore:
AGE GROUP FEMALE MALE 16-19 84% 88% 30-44 80% 92% 45-65 96% 96% Total 88% 92%
The same survey revealed that about 50% of the female workers interviewed worked in distribution and catering and that the other 50% worked in service industries. Approximately 45% of working males interviewed worked in service industries, 25% in distribution and catering, 25% in manufacturing and 5% in construction.
All males interviewed worked full time.16% of females woked part time.
